alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 08 at 2:16PM CDT until August 09 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for hot, dry, and windy conditions, which is in effect from noon to 10 PM CDT Wednesday. * WINDS...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. A wind shift will occur in the evening with northerly winds expected behind a cold front. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 19 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Up to 107. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will be difficult to put out. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * SEVERITY... FUELS (ERC)...90th-96th percentile...5 (out of 5). WEATHER...Elevated...1 (out of 5). FIRE ENVIRONMENT...6 (out of 10).
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
